alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 6:20AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN FLAGLER...SOUTHEASTERN ST. JOHNS AND EAST CENTRAL PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 645 AM EST... At 620 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near San Mateo, or near East Palatka, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph, pea size hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... East Palatka, Marineland, Crescent Beach, Butler Beach, San Mateo, and Dupont Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
